document.full_text: u.s. regulators privately have expressed doubts that some of the nation's nuclear power plants are prepared for a fukushima-scale disaster, undercutting their public confidence since japan's nuclear crisis began, documents released by an independent safety watchdog group show.
document.title: u.s. officials doubted nuclear safety plans: watchdog
lines_and_colors: u.s. regulators privately have expressed doubts that some of the nation's nuclear power plants are prepared for a fukushima-scale disaster, undercutting their public confidence since japan's nuclear crisis began, documents released by an independent safety watchdog group show.
